sourceInformation: Ancestry.com. Connecticut, U.S., Federal Naturalization Records, 1790-1996 [database on-line]. Lehi, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations, Inc., 2016. Original data: Naturalization Records. National Archives at Boston, Waltham, Massachusetts. A full list of sources can be found here.
